messages.title: Fighting to stop Brexit
messages.content: Paul Follows and the Lib Dems are leading the fight against Brexit. Paul said, “Whether it’s Boris Johnson’s deal or a Jeremy Corbyn deal, there is no deal as good as the one we already have as a member of the European Union. My first priority must be to stop a disastrous Brexit, but I will also fight to protect local health services, work to increase affordable housing and for real action on climate change.”

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Paul and the Liberal Democrats are fighting to stop Brexit, which they believe is worse than remaining in the EU.
Paul will fight to protect local services, such as schools and healthcare facilities.
Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.
The Liberal Democrats will take urgent action needed to protect the environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Invest in Schools, NHS, and Policing
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will invest billions in the NHS, send children to the best schools, and put more police on the streets to keep communities safe.

issues.brexitEurope: My first priority must be to stop a disastrous Brexit. Paul and the Lib Dems are leading the fight against Brexit.
issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.
issues.education: As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work to ensure our children go to the best schools. The Liberal Democrats will invest billions in our NHS after years of Tory neglect.
issues.environment: The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.
issues.health: As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work to ensure our children go to the best schools. The Liberal Democrats will invest billions in our NHS after years of Tory neglect.
issues.lawCrime: We will put more police in our communities to make them safer.

community.content: Paul will fight to protect local health services, work to increase affordable housing.

endorsements.endorsement: ‘Both Tories and Labour have failed the country’
‘British politics is falling apart – the Tories are to blame, but Labour is also a shambles’

quotes.text: ‘Both Tories and Labour have failed the country’
‘British politics is falling apart – the Tories are to blame, but Labour is also a shambles’

examples: Paul said, “Whether it’s Boris Johnson’s deal or a Jeremy Corbyn deal, there is no deal as good as the one we already have as a member of the European Union.”
My first priority must be to stop a disastrous Brexit, but I will also fight to protect local health services, work to increase affordable housing and for real action on climate change.
A Liberal Democrat government will build a country where every single person and community is valued, empowered and cared for.
We will end the Brexit mess, and we will protect our planet for future generations.
Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
We will put more police in our communities to make them safer.
Paul will fight to protect local services, such as our schools and healthcare facilities.
